Reason: The DESTINATION_TYPE configuration option in the batik software project is performance-sensitive because changing this value can significantly impact system performance. For example, if the destination type is set to a high-resolution output format, it may require more memory and processing power, leading to longer execution times and increased memory consumption. On the other hand, setting it to a lower resolution format may result in faster execution times and lower memory usage. Therefore, the value of DESTINATION_TYPE directly affects system performance, making it a performance-sensitive configuration option.
